Id Name Age
friends.id friends.name friends.age
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-friend', templateUrl: './friend.component.html', styleUrls: ['./friend.component.css'], }) export class FriendComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} friends: any; ngOnInit() { let response = this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/api/v1/student'); response.subscribe((data) => (this.friends = response)); } }
